title: DSWO Theni Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Case Worker Posts
description: The District Social Welfare Officer (DSWO) Theni has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Case Worker Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree, post-graduation, or LLB can grab this chance and apply for the DSWO Theni Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last ...
